chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
s: SF_seq
y0: T
x: R
Hs: sorted Rle (SF_lx s)
Hx: head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s)

Goal:
SF_fun s y0 x = match sorted_dec (SF_lx s) 0 x Hs Hx with | inleft H => nth y0 (SF_ly s) (proj1_sig H) | inright _ => nth y0 (SF_ly s) (SF_size s - 1) end

Premises:
nth = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) => fix nth (s : seq T) (n : nat) {struct n} : T := match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: s' => match n with | 0%nat => x | S n' => nth s' n' end end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> nat -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope nat_scope]
last = fun T : Type => fix last (x : T) (s : seq T) {struct s} : T := match s with | [::] => x | x' :: s' => last x' s' end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
head = fun (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => x0 | x :: _ => x end : forall T : Type, T -> seq T -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _ seq_scope]
SF_ly = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => unzip2 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
sorted_dec : forall (s : seq R) (x0 x : R), sorted Rle s -> head x0 s <= x <= last x0 s -> {i : nat | nth x0 s i <= x < nth x0 s (S i) /\ (S (S i) < size s)%nat} + {nth x0 s (size s - 2) <= x <= nth x0 s (size s - 1)}
SF_size = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => size (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> nat Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
Rle = fun r1 r2 : R => r1 < r2 \/ r1 = r2 : R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Inductive sumor (A : Type) (B : Prop) : Type := inleft : A -> A + {B} | inright : B -> A + {B} For inleft, when applied to no more than 1 argument: Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted For inleft, when applied to 2 arguments: Argument A is implicit For inright, when applied to no more than 1 argument: Arguments A, B are implicit and maximally inserted For inright, when applied to 2 arguments: Argument B is implicit For sumor: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope] For inleft: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _] For inright: Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope _]
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
SF_fun = fun (s : SF_seq) (y0 : T) (x : R) => SF_fun_aux (SF_h s, y0) (SF_t s) y0 x : SF_seq -> T -> R -> T Argument scopes are [_ _ R_scope]
sorted = fix sorted (T : Type) (Ord : T -> T -> Prop) (s : seq T) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | [::] => True | [:: h0] => True | h0 :: (h1 :: _) as t0 => Ord h0 h1 /\ sorted T Ord t0 end : forall T : Type, (T -> T -> Prop) -> seq T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope seq_scope]
SF_lx = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> seq R Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_size_lx_ly : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s0) = S (size (SF_ly s0)) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_size_ly : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (SF_ly s0) = SF_size s0 where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_rev_0 : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (rev (SF_lx s0)) = S (size (rev (SF_ly s0))) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_size_lx : forall s0 : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s0) = S (SF_size s0) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
last_unzip1 : forall (x0 : ?S) (y1 : ?T) (s0 : seq (?S * ?T)), last x0 (unzip1 s0) = fst (last (x0, y1) s0) where ?S : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type] ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_last_lx : forall (x0 : ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), fst (SF_last x0 s0) = last 0 (SF_lx s0) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_size_cons : forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), SF_size (SF_cons h s0) = S (SF_size s0) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_lx_cat : forall x0 y : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_cat x0 y) = SF_lx x0 ++ behead (SF_lx y) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_last_cat : forall x0 y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x0) (SF_lx x0) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> last (SF_h (SF_cat x0 y)) (SF_lx (SF_cat x0 y)) = last (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_cons_cat : forall (x0 : R * ?T) (x1 y : SF_seq), SF_cons x0 (SF_cat x1 y) = SF_cat (SF_cons x0 x1) y where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_cons_dec : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), P (SF_cons h s0)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_cons_ind : forall P : SF_seq -> Type, (forall x0 : R, P (SF_nil x0)) -> (forall (h : R * ?T) (s0 : SF_seq), P s0 -> P (SF_cons h s0)) -> forall s : SF_seq, P s where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
sorted_cat : forall (Ord : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s1 s2 : seq ?T) (x0 : ?T), sorted Ord s1 -> sorted Ord s2 -> Ord (last x0 s1) (head x0 s2) -> sorted Ord (s1 ++ s2) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
sorted_nth : forall (Ord : ?T -> ?T -> Prop) (s0 : seq ?T), sorted Ord s0 < -> (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (size s0))%nat -> forall x0 : ?T, Ord (nth x0 s0 i) (nth x0 s0 (S i))) where ?T : [T : Type s : SF_seq y0 : T x : R Hs : sorted Rle (SF_lx s) Hx : head 0 (SF_lx s) <= x <= last 0 (SF_lx s) |- Type]
SF_cut_up_l : forall (s : SF_seq) (x : R), x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> last (SF_h (SF_cut_up s x)) (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) = last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s)
pointed_subdiv = fun ptd : SF_seq => forall i : nat, (i < SF_size ptd)%nat -> nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_ly ptd) i <= nth 0 (SF_lx ptd) (S i) : SF_seq -> Prop
SF_cut_up_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_up s x)) < eps
SF_cut_down_step : forall (s : SF_seq) (x eps : R), SF_h s <= x <= last (SF_h s) (SF_lx s) -> seq_step (SF_lx s) < eps -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_cut_down s x)) < eps
Rabs_R0 = match Rcase_abs 0 as s return ((if s then - 0 else 0) = 0) with | left r => (fun H : ~ 0 < 0 => False_ind (- 0 = 0) (H r)) (Rlt_irrefl 0) | right _ => eq_refl end : Rabs 0 = 0
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
nth_compat : forall (s : seq R) (n : nat), pos_Rl (seq2Rlist s) n = nth 0 s n
seq_step = fun s : seq R => foldr Rmax 0 (pairmap (fun x y : R => Rabs (y - x)) (head 0 s) (behead s)) : seq R -> R Argument scope is [seq_scope]
SF_cat_pointed : forall x y : SF_seq, last (SF_h x) (SF_lx x) = head (SF_h y) (SF_lx y) -> pointed_subdiv x -> pointed_subdiv y -> pointed_subdiv (SF_cat x y)
nth_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (x : T) (n : nat), nth x0 (rcons s x) n = (if ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) then nth x0 s n else if eqtype.eq_op n (size s) then x else x0)
interval_finite_subdiv : forall (a b : R) (eps : posreal), a <= b -> {l : seq R | head 0 l = a /\ last 0 l = b /\ (forall i : nat, (S i < size l)%nat -> nth 0 l i < nth 0 l (S i) <= nth 0 l i + eps)}
BinIntDef.Z.compare = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => match y with | 0%Z => Eq | Z.pos _ => Lt | Z.neg _ => Gt end | Z.pos x' => match y with | Z.pos y' => (x' ?= y')%positive | _ => Gt end | Z.neg x' => match y with | Z.neg y' => CompOpp (x' ?= y')%positive | _ => Lt end end : Z -> Z -> comparison Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
SF_sorted = fun (T : Type) (Ord : R -> R -> Prop) (s : SF_seq) => sorted Ord (SF_lx s) : forall T : Type, (R -> R -> Prop) -> SF_seq -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _]
nth0 : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T), nth x0 s 0 = head x0 s
sorted_head : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, head x0 s <= nth x0 s i
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
sorted_last : forall (s : seq R) (i : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= last x0 s
sorted_incr : forall (s : seq R) (i j : nat), sorted Rle s -> (i <= j)%nat -> (j < size s)%nat -> forall x0 : R, nth x0 s i <= nth x0 s j
INR = fix INR (n : nat) : R := match n with | 0%nat => 0 | 1%nat => 1 | S (S _ as n0) => INR n0 + 1 end : nat -> R Argument scope is [nat_scope]
nfloor_ex : forall x : R, 0 <= x -> {n : nat | INR n <= x < INR n + 1}
BinIntDef.Z.mul = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' * y') end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos y' => Z.neg (x' * y') | Z.neg y' => Z.pos (x' * y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Zeq_bool = fun x y : Z => match (x ?= y)%Z with | Eq => true | _ => false end : Z -> Z -> bool Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
BinIntDef.Z.opp = fun x : Z => match x with | 0%Z => 0%Z | Z.pos x0 => Z.neg x0 | Z.neg x0 => Z.pos x0 end : Z -> Z Argument scope is [Z_scope]
pos_Rl = fix pos_Rl (l : Rlist) (i : nat) {struct l} : R := match l with | nil => 0 | cons a l' => match i with | 0%nat => a | S i' => pos_Rl l' i' end end : Rlist -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope]
ptd_sort' : forall ptd : SF_seq, pointed_subdiv ptd -> sorted Rle (SF_ly ptd)
last_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1) (x : T1), last (f x) [seq f i | i <- s] = f (last x s)

```coq
unfold SF_fun. unfold sorted_dec. destruct (sorted_dec (SF_lx s) 0 x Hs Hx) as [H | H].
- destruct H as [i [Hlt Hgt]]. rewrite -> Hlt. reflexivity.
- destruct H. rewrite last_nth. reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: unfold SF_fun. unfold sorted_dec. destruct (sorted_dec (SF_lx s) 0 x Hs Hx) as [H | H]. - destruct H as [i [Hlt Hgt]]. rewrite -> Hlt. reflexivity. - destruct H. rewrite last_nth. reflexivity.
